name: community-iam-samlprovider
description: AWS custom resource provider named Community::IAM::SamlProvider.

scripts.submit: cfn generate && npm run build && cfn submit -vv --region eu-west-1 --set-default
scripts.package: cfn generate && npm run build && cfn submit --dry-run -vv && cp ${npm_package_name}.zip ${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.zip
scripts.publish: npm run package && aws s3 cp ${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.zip s3://community-resource-provider-catalog/${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.zip && aws s3 cp resource-role.yaml s3://community-resource-provider-catalog/${npm_package_name}-resource-role-${npm_package_version}.yml
